remarks: Distribution of negative over vector subtraction.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Aug-2007.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
vcni.1 $e |- G = ( 1st ` W ) $.
vcni.2 $e |- S = ( 2nd ` W ) $.
vcni.3 $e |- X = ran G $.
vcnegsubdi2 $p |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( -u 1 S ( A G ( -u 1 S B ) ) ) = ( B G ( -u 1 S A ) ) ) $.
